landing.initText: Understand how the power of joining persistence with strategy can make you learn everything
landing.txCard1: Make a complete diagnosis of your strengths and weaknesses using statistics.It will be very easy to find yourself and the constant evolution.
landing.txCard2: Optimize your time with a history of all your revisions and there will be no need to relearn.
landing.txCard3: Automatic calculation of the periodicity of time between each new revision and new subject.
